channel.title: Need help i cant login please read this vestig-x clien and source
channel.description:
[b]hallo MEMBERS of moparscape i need yuo help my client its working only i cant login i get this whane i [b]run[/b] the server http://prntscr.com/3ve4gt
[b]please pc me on skype to help to fix it
markislol100[/b][/b]

item.title: Need help i cant login please read this vestig-x clien and source
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

[quote=“ownerstewie, post:1, topic:544201”][b]hallo MEMBERS of moparscape i need yuo help my client its working only i cant login
i get this whane i run the server
http://prntscr.com/3ve4gt

[b]please pc me on skype to help to fix it

markislol100[/b][/b][/quote]

Wonderful grammar.

IfearI:

[quote]Failed to connect to MySql database.

That’s what the error says down there. So… you didn’t set it up right or you didn’t at all.[/quote]

No shit… I’m prreeeetty sure that when you get compiler errors, it means something isn’t set up right.

Anyways @OP, your source is trying to connect to a MySQL database, for highscores. Check through your files for one of the following: SQL.Java Highscores.Java, etc. If you find it paste it here.

Read full topic
